ygData.subject: Re: SV: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: My very fist char was a gnome enchanter... way back when EQ was Comercially released, I was unable to train any skill points into him either.  I eventually
ygData.messageBody:
My very fist char was a gnome enchanter... way back when EQ was Comercially
released, I was unable to train any skill points into him either. I
eventually killed him for being forever bugged ' always getting nocked under
the world I thought I could not put a point into tinker. When I created a
new char... at lvl 16 I was able to put a poiint in... you may have missed it
.. you know how all the spells in akanon can cause you to miss some messages.
Diablo
